title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Gender Balance in Business
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Gender Balance in Business 

Survey) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (gender balance business survey) order 2021

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: In this Order -
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order - 

“board of directors”, in relation to an undertaking, means the directing body of 
the undertaking; 

“senior executive team”, in relation to an undertaking, means the group of 
individuals responsible for the day to day management of the undertaking and 
accountable to the board of directors for such management; 

“survey” means the Gender Balance in Business Survey that is conducted by the 
Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining the information specified 
in the Schedule.
text_norm: 2 order - board director relation undertaking mean directing body undertaking senior executive team relation undertaking mean group individual responsible day day management undertaking accountable board director management survey mean gender balance business survey conducted central statistic office purpose obtaining information specified schedule

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: 3. This Order applies to an undertaking that -
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to an undertaking that - 

(a) 

(b) 

employs 250 or more persons, and 

is classified for statistical purposes under section B, C, D, E, F, 
G, H, I, J, K, L, M, N, R or S of NACE Rev. 2 set out in Annex I 
to Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 20 December 20061, as amended by 
Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 11 March 20082, Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 of 
the European Parliament and of the Council of 18 January 20123 
and Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the European Parliament and 
of the Council of 20 June 20194.
text_norm: 3 order applies undertaking - (a) (b) employ 250 person classified statistical purpose section b c e f g h j k l n r nace rev 2 set annex regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 european parliament council 20 december 20061 amended regulation (ec) no 295 2008 european parliament council 11 march 20082 regulation (eu) no 70 2012 european parliament council 18 january 20123 regulation (eu) 2019 1243 european parliament council 20 june 20194

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: 4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide,
text_raw:
4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide, 
once only and for the purposes of the survey, information the general nature of 
which is specified in the Schedule, is hereby prescribed. 

1 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13 
3 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1. 
4 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 SCHEDULE 

[93] 3 

Article 4

title: 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial Functions)
heading: Information on the time taken by the undertaking concerned to complete
text_raw:
3. 

Information on the time taken by the undertaking concerned to complete 
the questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director General for the 
collection of the information referred to in paragraphs 1 and 2. 

GIVEN under my hand, 

2 March, 2021. 

JACK CHAMBERS 

 Minister of State at the Department of the Taoiseach.
